name: Samorost 2
description: Samorost 2, the sequel to free browser based game Samorost 1 is a short point-and-click adventure in which you must help out a little space gnome as he searches for his dog, which has been taken away by aliens.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 256MB Graphics: No special requirements Hard Drive: 30MB Sound: No special requirements
